entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:40AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SALMON RIVER NEAR HYDER CONTINUES STEADY RISE... The Salmon River has been rising since Sunday due to warm temperatures at elevation causing snow melt into the basin and a possible release from Summit Lake. entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:55AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Winds Through Tonight... West winds gusting to 50 mph will continue through this afternoon, with gusts to 40 mph tonight. Winds will decrease on Friday. Periods of snow may cause low visibility at times through tonight.
